channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2025 NFL Odds Week 17: Lines, Spreads for all 16 Games
item.description: Check out the odds for every NFL Week 17 matchup, beginning with Christmas Day.

item.title: Ravens, Broncos, 49ers, Seahawks Lead Way With 6 Players at NFL Pro Bowl Games
item.description: Six Baltimore Ravens, Denver Broncos, San Francisco 49ers and Seattle Seahawks were selected for the NFL Pro Bowl Games.

item.title: 'Way We Do Playoffs is Messed Up': Oregon Ducks HC Dan Lanning Slams CFP Format
item.description: Oregon head coach Dan Lanning criticized the CFP neutral site format, as the Ducks prepare for Big 12-champion Texas Tech.

item.title: Kansas Jayhawks HC Bill Self: Darryn Peterson Family Playing Role in His Return
item.description: As Kansas freshman Darryn Peterson is sidelined with a quad injury, Bill Self explained the role the guard's family is playing.

item.title: 2025 College Football Bowl Game Odds: Lines, Spreads for Every Game
item.description: College football bowl season is here, so it's time to dive into the odds for every matchup. Here are the latest lines.

item.title: The NHL's best this week: Is Craig Berube on the hot seat in Toronto?
item.description: As the holiday break approaches, the Maple Leafs aren't exactly excelling. Plus, key games in the week ahead.

item.title: Transfer portal: Tracking who intends to move
item.description: The transfer portal opens on Jan. 2. We're keeping tabs on players intending to enter.

item.title: Chelsea are using Strasbourg as a "farm team" -- is this the new blueprint for top clubs?
item.description: Strasbourg now exists as a training ground for Chelsea prospects, akin to baseball's farm system. Is this the future of European soccer?

item.title: World Junior Championship guide: Top contenders, key players to watch
item.description: The tournament starts Thursday, with the best under-20 players in hockey. Here are gold medal favorites, players set to break out.

item.title: Overreactions: Are Villa in the title race? Can Wolves avoid history?
item.description: Just before we hit the crowded festive fixtures, we have plenty to overreact to in the Premier League.
